DellControllerBattery.description: An instance of DellController will have RAID Controller specific data.
DellControllerBattery.longDescription: An instance of DellController will have RAID Controller specific data.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

FQDD.description: This property represents the Fully Qualified Device Description (FQDD) that uniquely identifies a device.
FQDD.longDescription: This property represents the Fully Qualified Device Description (FQDD) that uniquely identifies a device.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

PrimaryStatus.description: PrimaryStatus provides a high-level status of the device.
PrimaryStatus.longDescription: PrimaryStatus provides a high-level status of the device.

RAIDState.description: RAIDState provides the current battery status.
RAIDState.longDescription: RAIDState provides the current battery status.
